SELECT e.* FROM personal_mgmt_ex p, energy e WHERE p.u_id = #{u_id} AND p.p_month = #{p_month} AND p.input_num = e.input_num
SELECT * FROM personal_mgmt_ex WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND p_month LIKE #{p_month} ORDER BY input_num
SELECT * FROM energy WHERE input_num = (SELECT input_num FROM personal_mgmt_ex WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND p_month = #{p_month} )
SELECT AVG(${energyName}) FROM energy WHERE input_num IN( SELECT input_num FROM personal_mgmt_ex WHERE p_month like #{p_month} AND width = #{width} )
